com.paydiant.android.core.util

Class DevicePropertyUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.util.DevicePropertyUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDevicePropertyCodes

    public class DevicePropertyUtil
extends Object
implements IDevicePropertyCodes
    A utility class whose responsibility is to provide utilty method / methods to extract device properties from the device.
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DevicePropertyUtil

        public DevicePropertyUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveDeviceProperties

        public static Map<String,String> retrieveDeviceProperties(ContextWrapper deviceContext)
        This method will extract the list of device properties from the device and return it in a hashmap as a collection of key/value pairs.

        Return set of properties would be:
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.DEVICE_ID
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.MANUFACTURER
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.BRAND
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.MODEL
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.CPU_ARCHITECT
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.NETWORK_OPERATOR_NAME
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.BUILD_VERSION
        Parameters:
        deviceContext - the device context
        Returns:
        a Map which will include the device properties of the device as a collection of key/value

      • retrieveActiveWifiInfo

        @Deprecated
public static Map<String,String> retrieveActiveWifiInfo(ContextWrapper deviceContext)
        Deprecated. Use retrieveActiveNetworkInfo(ContextWrapper) instead.
        Returns information about the wifi-network. Will return null or empty Map if wifi disabled, or not configured.

        Return set of properties would be:
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.WIFI_SSID
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.WIFI_MAC_ADDRESS
        Parameters:
        deviceContext -
        Returns:
        null or empty Map if wifi disabled, or not configured

      • retrieveCurrentSystemInfo

        public static Map<String,String> retrieveCurrentSystemInfo(ContextWrapper deviceContext)
        Returns current system information such as available memory, no of running processes etc.

        Return set of properties would be:
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.NO_OF_RUNNING_PROCESSES
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.AVAILABLE_MEMORY
        Parameters:
        deviceContext -
        Returns:
        a Map containing current system information

      • retrieveActiveNetworkInfo

        public static Map<String,String> retrieveActiveNetworkInfo(ContextWrapper deviceContext)
        Returns information about the devices current active data network. The returned map will always contain the key IDevicePropertyCodes.ACTIVE_NETWORK_TYPE specifying the type of active network. This can be either IDevicePropertyCodes.ACTIVE_NETWORK_TYPE_WIFI for wifi data networks, or IDevicePropertyCodes.ACTIVE_NETWORK_TYPE_MOBILE for mobile networks.

        if IDevicePropertyCodes.ACTIVE_NETWORK_TYPE is IDevicePropertyCodes.ACTIVE_NETWORK_TYPE_WIFI then the returned map will have the properties;
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.WIFI_SSID
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.WIFI_MAC_ADDRESS

        if IDevicePropertyCodes.ACTIVE_NETWORK_TYPE is IDevicePropertyCodes.ACTIVE_NETWORK_TYPE_MOBILE then the returned map will have the properties;
        • IDevicePropertyCodes.NETWORK_OPERATOR_NAME
        If there aren't any active data networks available, this will return null.
        Parameters:
        deviceContext -
        Returns:
        map containing mobile network info, wifi network info or null if the device is not connected to any data networks.

      • isAirplaneModeOn

        public static boolean isAirplaneModeOn(Context context)
        Checks whether the devices airplane mode is turned on of off.
        Parameters:
        context - - Application context
        Returns:
        true if the airplane mode is turned on. false otherwise.
